localize.text: It's time to complete your last unfinished puzzle.
I wish you the best of luck to the rest of your journey.
Saying I hope you will finally be happy, or that some of the pain left can be relieved now have long become empty words.
There are more things I would like to say, but let me sum them up into one sentence.
I wish you success this time.
I enjoyed being with you for no only the 45 days but also the moments that you don't remember.
Well, now there is one last Sephirah you need to meet.
He looks like a warm-hearted man, but he can break people’s hearts like they are nothing.
